name: getEquivalence
description:
Creates an equivalence relation for arrays.
*Example
documentation:
Creates an equivalence relation for arrays.
*Example**

```ts
import { Array } from "effect"

const eq = Array.getEquivalence<number>((a, b) => a === b)
console.log(eq([1, 2, 3], [1, 2, 3])) // true
```
